00185     // Returns the number of vertices in this type
00186     // of element, or 0 if a variable number.
00187   inline size_t MsqMeshEntity::vertex_count() const
00188   { return mType == POLYGON || mType == POLYHEDRON ? 
00189            node_count() : TopologyInfo::corners( mType ); }
00190 
00191   inline void MsqMeshEntity::set_connectivity( std::size_t *indices,
00192                                                size_t num_vertices )
00193   {
00194     vertexIndices = indices;
00195     numVertexIndices = num_vertices;
00196   }
00197   
00198   inline const std::size_t *MsqMeshEntity::get_vertex_index_array() const
00199   { return vertexIndices; }
00200   
00201   inline std::size_t *MsqMeshEntity::get_vertex_index_array()
00202   { return vertexIndices; }
00203  
00204   inline std::size_t 
00205   MsqMeshEntity::get_vertex_index(std::size_t vertex_in_element) const
00206   {
00207       // Make sure we're in range
00208     assert(vertex_in_element < vertex_count());
00209       // Return the index
00210     return vertexIndices[vertex_in_element];
00211   }
